description: SynchroKnit® patented contour knit creates an unrivaled precise fit. Products made with CiCLO(R) fibers reduce the persistence of plastic microfiber pollution in oceans and plastic accumulation in landfills. Double "Y" heel gore provides most precise heel fit.
name: Bravura Quarter Lightweight Socks

specs.value: 55% Hydrowik with CiCLO®, 34% Stretch Nylon, 5% Polyester, 5% Spandex, 1% Tencel
